name: Freedoom
description:
A game for the great "My first Game Jam summer 2021"

This is a story about a guy named Carl who hates his job, And one day he thinks of escaping his office. He uses his paintball gun to knock out the employees who are trying to stop him.

Being warned though this game is extremely buggy  when i say extremely i mean VERY BUGGY. The reason is because my exams were going on and i was juggling both of them at the same time which was not comfortable so i rushed to complete it .
